rationale: The agent swiftly identified the payment issue, provided a clear explanation, and confirmed its resolution, leading to a fully satisfied customer. The communication was polite and efficient throughout the interaction.
The agent responded empathetically, verified the issue, initiated the refund promptly, and clearly communicated next steps.
The agent provided minimal troubleshooting and did not offer proactive support or escalation, leading to an unresolved issue.
The agent was dismissive, did not take ownership, and failed to provide structured troubleshooting or escalation steps.
The cancellation was processed smoothly and professionally, though the agent could have offered a retention incentive.
